column4: hi all, after I installed 10.10, evince does not display any eps-file
this is driving me nuts, what can I do to get rid of this problem?
what happens when you try to open the file?  Have you tried to open it from terminal?  what was the output?
here's a similar bug that shows a fix: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/evince/+bug/598391
